localtag-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the LocalTag extension.
localtag-special-intro: The administrators have implemented <localtag> to provide extra tags you may use in markup.
localtag-error-require-attributes: '''Error''': <localtag> requires one (or more) attributes to be effective.
localtag-css-for-this: CSS for LocalTag, using {{PLURAL:$2|this argument|these arguments}}: $1
localtag-missing-html: The construct '$1' does not have any HTML associated with it. Using it will have zero effect, and is therefore discouraged.
